Description: Fragment of flattened handle with a gradual curve from a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Names, Chrysostratos, Euphron. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p.31, 52. Trimmed. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum,ABC 0362.22. cf. Finkielsztejn, G, Chronologie détaillée et révisée des éponymes amphoriques rhodiens, de 270 à 108 av. J.-C. environ : premier bilan (Oxford 2001) 56, pl. III, 57.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0546)
